description: Slightly crispy crust with a soft potato center filled with veggie goodness. You can use any veggies or seasonings of your choice in this recipe.
keywords: Finger food,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Potato,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Crispy Potato Patties Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Mash up the boiled potatoes in a bowl.
Add the chopped up veggies. You can use any veggies that you like - just cut them up small.
Add the seasonings. I like mine a bit spicy but you can also used mixed herbs or any of your favourite seasonings.
Mix everything thoroughly in a bowl.
Beat an egg in a separate bowl and add a splash of water to thin it out.
Form small patties with the potato mixture and dip each one in the egg wash, then coat with breadcrumbs.
Heat up some oil in a frying pan and pan fry each patty until the crust is golden and slightly crispy and the filling inside is warm.
Serve warm by themselves with sweet chilli sauce and/or with a side salad.
